messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: Requirements for Tosogu Photographs.
messages.msgSnippet: Looks like Myochin Ki Muneharu though it is still not totally clear. Can you email me a large image at my address above ?, the images on Yahoo are shrunk and
messages.messageBody:
Looks like Myochin Ki Muneharu though it is still not totally clear. Can
you email me a large image at my address above ?, the images on Yahoo
are shrunk and hard to make out sometimes. I have yet to find a listing
on him. I am still looking.

Rich

messages.messageBody:
I knew it was hiding somewhere............Just couldn't remember.
Buy the way, have you had a chance to view the NEW pictures of the
Myochin mei in my photo album?

Thanks Rich.

Elliott

messages.messageBody:
Elliot, Barry et all. Richard posted an article on tosogu.com about this
not too long back. You will find it here.

http://tosogu.blogspot.com/2006/08/photographing-tosogu.html#links

Cheers

Rich Turner

messages.subject: Requirements for Tosogu Photographs.
messages.msgSnippet: Barry, I just looked at both links and files and the article is not there. It was written by Richard K. George. The article might be part of the NBTHK AB
messages.messageBody:
Barry,

I just looked at both 'links' and 'files' and the article is not
there. It was written by Richard K. George. The article might be part
of the NBTHK AB web site. I will check there next.

When I find it, I will let you know.

Elliott
